text: Carl Plötz (1814 – 12 August 1886, Greifswald) was a German entomologist who specialised in Lepidoptera and in particular Hesperiidae. He was a member of the Entomological Society of Stettin. He wrote (from 1879 onwards) * various dates; (1879) * 41: Heterocera text Rhopalocera text (1880) * 55(3):1-22, (1880) * ; 40 (7-9): 406-411 (1881) * , 42 : 500-504; 43 (1882, but published in 1881) * 26:71-82, 253-266 (1882) * 45 (4-6): 151-166 (1884) * , 17: 485-528 (1886). ==References== *Friese, G. 1959: Die Erforschung der mecklenburgischen Schmetterlings-Fauna. (Ein Beitrag zur Geschichte der Entomologie in Deutschland). Arch. Freunde Naturgesch. Mecklenb. 5 226-264 248 *Mac Lachlan, R. 1886: [Plötz, C.] Proc. Ent. Soc. London 1886 LXX *Musgrave, A. 1932: Bibliography of Australian Entomology 1775 - 1930.Sydney Category:German entomologists Category:German lepidopterists Category:1814 births Category:1886 deaths
title: Carl Plötz
